title: Seasonal flu vaccination, by age group Romania 2019 | Statista
author: Statista Research Department; Jun
description: The majority of people who did not vaccinate against seasonal flu in Romania in 2019 belonged to the 18-34 age group.
cleaned_text: Vaccination against seasonal flu in Romania, by age group 2019 [The majority of](#statisticContainer) [people who did not vaccinate against seasonal flu in Romania](/statistics/1101155/seasonal-flu-vaccination-romania/)in 2019 belonged to the 18-34 age group. The percentage of people vaccinated was higher as the age group increased.
